ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Digest Number 172
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you. One suggestion.... could you cut out the trailer info and other topics if you are replying only to one of them? Digest mode is so annoying
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you.

One suggestion.... could you cut out the trailer info and other topics if
you are replying only to one of them? Digest mode is so annoying sometimes,
and this list isn't that active. Not to be a jerk, just trying to lower the
amount I have to sift through to find what you are talking about. :-)

--
Sabbat
